definitions.text: place of business where professional or clerical duties are performed
examples: he rented an office in the new building

definitions.text: the actions and activities assigned to or required or expected of a person or group
examples: the government must do its part

definitions.text: (of a government or government official) holding an office means being in power
examples: being in office already gives a candidate a great advantage
during his first year in office
during his first year in power

definitions.text: professional or clerical workers in an office
examples: the whole office was late the morning of the blizzard

definitions.text: a religious rite or service prescribed by ecclesiastical authorities

examples: he occupied a post in the treasury
